item.title: [PI] Need help changing item level requirements
item.dc:creator: @tztk tztk
item.description:
@tztk wrote:

On the base Iâ€™m using torva, virtus, and pernis dont have any level requirements, so I went into itemassistant.java and posted this:

if (itemName.contains("Pernix")) { c.hitpointsLevelReq = 80; c.defenceLevelReq = 80; c.rangeLevelReq = 80; } if (itemName.contains("Virtus")) { c.hitpointsLevelReq = 80; c.defenceLevelReq = 80; c.magicLevelReq = 80; } if (itemName.contains("Torva")) { c.hitpointsLevelReq = 80; c.defenceLevelReq = 80; c.strengthLevelReq = 80; }
Upon Compilation I recieved this error:

src\server\model\items\ItemAssistan.java:711: cannot find symbol symbol : variable hitpointsLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.hitpointsLevelReq = 80; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:716: cannot find symbol symbol : variable hitpointsLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.hitpointsLevelReq = 80; ^ src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:721: cannot find symbol symbol : variable hitpointsLevelReq location: class server.model.players.Client c.hitpointsLevelReq = 80; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Could anyone please tell me how to fix this error? Thanks in advance.

Read full topic
